title: [RG.REBOOT] Nichijou {720p} REPACK
description:
<a href="http://i.imgur.com/4JdXs6l.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://i.imgur.com/4JdXs6l.jpg</a>

Movie Notes 
~~~~~~~~~~~
The series follows the lives of a group of high school students and their school. 
Various oddities and absurdities abound, such as a robotic girl made by a scientist 
who is an eight-year-old girl, a boy who rides a goat to school with his butler, a 
girl who can procure various guns out of thin air, a cat that can speak and a principal 
who has wrestled a deer. Despite its bizarre settings and characters, the students still 
lead normal lives.


RIP Notes
~~~~~~~~~
This rip was repacked from the 'HorribleSubs' MKV's, (http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7527477/)
uploaded by sokroker.

REBOOT.OP then proceeded to extract the raw video and audio, along with the subtitles, then
convert the said .ASS subtitles into .SRT subtitles, for reinsertion back into a proper MP4
file video with no quality loss or size increase.


PLAYBACK NOTE
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
It is recommended that you use VLC Media Player to play these files if you want the subtitles,
as being them softsubs, WMP doesn't seen to notice them. 

To turn the subtitles on, just find your way in VLC to:

VIDEO --> SUBTITLES TRACK --> TRACK 1

That will enable English subtitles on your video


More Info
~~~~~~~~~
Wiki: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nichijou
Official Site (Japanese): http://www.shinonome-lab.com/
